price: “If only we had a scripture[43] like the previous people,
arabic: لَوۡ أَنَّ عِندَنَا ذِكۡرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
footnotes: [43] Such as the Torah and the Gospel.
